meanings.definition: A group of double-stranded RNA viruses that infect animals and plants.
meanings.sent1: Reoviruses can cause diseases in both animals and plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying reoviruses to understand how they infect different organisms.
meanings.sent3: The reoviruses decided to throw a party inside the plant cells.
meanings.sent4: The reoviruses spread through the animal population like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The image of reoviruses invading the cells is both fascinating and terrifying.

meanings.definition: Any virus belonging to the Reoviridae family.
meanings.sent1: My research focuses on studying reoviruses within the Reoviridae family.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are working on developing vaccines to target specific reoviruses.
meanings.sent3: The Reoviridae family reunion was full of diverse viruses, including reoviruses.
meanings.sent4: The reoviruses in the Reoviridae family are like distant cousins to other viruses.
meanings.sent5: The complexity of the Reoviridae family and its reoviruses is mind-boggling.
